content:
Prepare your package for courier pickup.   Select an appropriate-sized box or envelope and place your item inside. Make sure if you’re sending something fragile that your packaging is cushioned and your item is secure. Once you have your item or items in the appropriate package, seal the parcel with packaging tape. [1]   
 
 Depending on where you are located, there are some restrictions on what you can and cannot mail. Items such as explosives, gasoline, aerosol, and ammunition are normally prohibited. Check the website of the national postal service in your country to ensure you are not mailing something that is prohibited.  
  
  
  
 Measure the parcel you’d like to send.   Carefully measure the length, width, and height of the box. If you have a kitchen scale, it will also be helpful to weigh the parcel as well. This will help you get a good idea of how much you can expect to pay for courier service. Many courier sites will ask you to input the parcel's dimensions and estimated weight when you book the pickup. [2]   
 
 If in doubt, overestimate. This will help you avoid additional charges later on.  
  
  
 Search for courier services that pick up near you.   Some courier services only work within specific areas or countries. Many work internationally. To get the most accurate results, do a search of your city or town name and the words “courier service.” This should yield a number of companies that provide service to your area. [3]   
 
 You should also check the delivery address to ensure that the courier service will deliver to that location. Most websites will have an address checker tool.  
  
  
 Compare prices for shipping your parcel at different companies.   Narrow your search by looking at the prices listed for courier service based on the dimensions that you measured for your parcel. Compare different companies and see how their prices differ for the size package that you have. [4]   
 
 You should also consider the type of parcel being sent and if it has any requirements such as temperature or extra care when delivering, as these can incur added fees.  
  
  
 Check the pickup hours and delivery options offered by the courier.   The service will likely require you to be present for pickup, so you will want to make sure you can be home during the hours specified. You might also look at any time guarantees that they might make, especially if you are working within a time frame. [5]   
 
 Some courier services offer drop off locations. This might work best for you if you are not able to be at home during the day for pick up.  
  
  
 Create an account with your chosen service.   This process will vary by website, but will normally require you to input some information. You will likely be asked to enter your name, address, phone number, email address, and some form of payment information. This will make the process of arranging a pickup much easier.

  
 Select a location for pickup.   If you would like the package picked up from your house, simply use your home address. However, if you are working from another location, make sure you carefully enter the address to avoid any confusion. Some couriers will allow you to select a time, but many places give you a window of time that your package will be picked up within. [6]   
 
 Depending on the location you are sending the package to and the time frame it will take to get the package there, the price will vary. Make sure to check the price once more before booking a pickup time.  
  
  
 Pay for and print your label.   Once you have selected a location, you can confirm your pickup and pay. This will generate a label for your parcel that you can either print out and affix to the packaging, or simply copy the label information onto the package in clear handwriting using a marker. [7]   
  
 Wait for collection by a courier.   The courier should arrive during the time allotted by the company. Be patient and make sure you are home during this time. If your courier is late or doesn’t show up, call the customer service number provided on the company website or in your confirmation email. [8]   
  
 Track your parcel.   Once your parcel is picked up, you should receive an email for tracking or be able to use your confirmation number provided. This will let you see where your package is located from pickup to delivery at any point. [9]   
 
 If at any point you see that your package is delayed, or if it gets delivered incorrectly, tracking the package can help you ensure that the problem is dealt with quickly.
title: How to Arrange a Courier Pick Up

<p>Courier services provide fast pickup and delivery services for high-value goods or urgent documents. In order to use a courier, you must schedule a pickup time for a representative from the company to come get your package. To ensure proper delivery, you should prepare ahead of time and make sure you have followed the courier directions for a proper pickup.</p>

</div>
<div data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-id="scrolltoad" data-maxnonsteps="0" data-maxsteps="2" data-slot="6515934903" data-type="scrollto" id="scrolltoad"></div>

<h2 class="hidden"><span class="mw-headline" id="Steps">Steps</span></h2>
<a class="anchor" name="Selecting_a_Courier_Service_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky steps_first">
<h3>
<div class="altblock">Part <span>1</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Selecting_a_Courier_Service">Selecting a Courier Service</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_1">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-1.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-1.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-1.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-1.jpg" height="546" id="img_e9073fde04" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_e9073fde04')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-1.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-1.jpg" width="728"/></noscript>
<script>WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');</script></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Prepare your package for courier pickup.</b> Select an appropriate-sized box or envelope and place your item inside. Make sure if you’re sending something fragile that your packaging is cushioned and your item is secure. Once you have your item or items in the appropriate package, seal the parcel with packaging tape.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 1" class="reference" id="_ref-1"><a href="#_note-1">[1]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Depending on where you are located, there are some restrictions on what you can and cannot mail. Items such as explosives, gasoline, aerosol, and ammunition are normally prohibited. Check the website of the national postal service in your country to ensure you are not mailing something that is prohibited.</li>
</ul>
<script>WH.performance.mark('step1_rendered');</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d3/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-2.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_5b6f66e3c0" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_5b6f66e3c0')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d3/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-2.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Measure the parcel you’d like to send.</b> Carefully measure the length, width, and height of the box. If you have a kitchen scale, it will also be helpful to weigh the parcel as well. This will help you get a good idea of how much you can expect to pay for courier service. Many courier sites will ask you to input the parcel's dimensions and estimated weight when you book the pickup.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 2" class="reference" id="_ref-2"><a href="#_note-2">[2]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>If in doubt, overestimate. This will help you avoid additional charges later on.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-3.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-3.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/de/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-3.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-3.jpg" height="546" id="img_c30ba83f1a" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_c30ba83f1a')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/de/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-3.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-3.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Search for courier services that pick up near you.</b> Some courier services only work within specific areas or countries. Many work internationally. To get the most accurate results, do a search of your city or town name and the words “courier service.” This should yield a number of companies that provide service to your area.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 3" class="reference" id="_ref-3"><a href="#_note-3">[3]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>You should also check the delivery address to ensure that the courier service will deliver to that location. Most websites will have an address checker tool.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-4.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-4.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e6/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-4.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-4.jpg" height="546" id="img_d573f938e3" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_d573f938e3')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e6/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-4.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-4.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Compare prices for shipping your parcel at different companies.</b> Narrow your search by looking at the prices listed for courier service based on the dimensions that you measured for your parcel. Compare different companies and see how their prices differ for the size package that you have.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 4" class="reference" id="_ref-4"><a href="#_note-4">[4]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>You should also consider the type of parcel being sent and if it has any requirements such as temperature or extra care when delivering, as these can incur added fees.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-5.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-5.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/56/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-5.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-5.jpg" height="546" id="img_7adf227757" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_7adf227757')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/56/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-5.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-5.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Check the pickup hours and delivery options offered by the courier.</b> The service will likely require you to be present for pickup, so you will want to make sure you can be home during the hours specified. You might also look at any time guarantees that they might make, especially if you are working within a time frame.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 5" class="reference" id="_ref-5"><a href="#_note-5">[5]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Some courier services offer drop off locations. This might work best for you if you are not able to be at home during the day for pick up.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="methodad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-apsload="1" data-channels="3492389196" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="0" data-service="dfp" data-slot="" data-viewablerefresh="1">
<div id="methodad"></div>
<script>googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('methodad'); });</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addBodyAd('methodad')</script>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Booking_Your_Pickup_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock">Part <span>2</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Booking_Your_Pickup">Booking Your Pickup</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_2">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-6.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-6.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5e/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-6.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-6.jpg" height="546" id="img_d3efa1f25e" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_d3efa1f25e')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5e/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-6.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-6.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Create an account with your chosen service.</b> This process will vary by website, but will normally require you to input some information. You will likely be asked to enter your name, address, phone number, email address, and some form of payment information. This will make the process of arranging a pickup much easier.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-7.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-7.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/ba/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-7.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-7.jpg" height="546" id="img_49c2921ad2" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_49c2921ad2')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/ba/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-7.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-7.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Select a location for pickup.</b> If you would like the package picked up from your house, simply use your home address. However, if you are working from another location, make sure you carefully enter the address to avoid any confusion. Some couriers will allow you to select a time, but many places give you a window of time that your package will be picked up within.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 6" class="reference" id="_ref-6"><a href="#_note-6">[6]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Depending on the location you are sending the package to and the time frame it will take to get the package there, the price will vary. Make sure to check the price once more before booking a pickup time.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-8.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-8.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/05/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-8.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-8.jpg" height="546" id="img_55ef582c76" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_55ef582c76')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/05/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-8.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-8.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Pay for and print your label.</b> Once you have selected a location, you can confirm your pickup and pay. This will generate a label for your parcel that you can either print out and affix to the packaging, or simply copy the label information onto the package in clear handwriting using a marker.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 7" class="reference" id="_ref-7"><a href="#_note-7">[7]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-9.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-9.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/28/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-9.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-9.jpg" height="546" id="img_b8bf38d653" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b8bf38d653')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/28/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-9.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-9.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Wait for collection by a courier.</b> The courier should arrive during the time allotted by the company. Be patient and make sure you are home during this time. If your courier is late or doesn’t show up, call the customer service number provided on the company website or in your confirmation email.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 8" class="reference" id="_ref-8"><a href="#_note-8">[8]</a></sup>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage final_li">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-10.jpg?ajax=true&aid=9691344" href="#/Image:Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-10.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/33/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-10.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-10.jpg" height="546" id="img_8b7c0c2571" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8b7c0c2571')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Arrange a Courier Pick Up Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/33/Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-10.jpg/aid9691344-v4-728px-Arrange-a-Courier-Pick-Up-Step-10.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Track your parcel.</b> Once your parcel is picked up, you should receive an email for tracking or be able to use your confirmation number provided. This will let you see where your package is located from pickup to delivery at any point.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 9" class="reference" id="_ref-9"><a href="#_note-9">[9]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>If at any point you see that your package is delayed, or if it gets delivered incorrectly, tracking the package can help you ensure that the problem is dealt with quickly.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div id="tocad_wrap">
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="tocad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-channels="3492389196" data-lateload="1" data-loaded="0" data-service="adsense" data-slot="3356467874" data-viewablerefresh="1" id="tocad_outer"><div class="step_ad" id="tocad"></div></div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addTOCAd('tocad')</script>
</div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Questions_and_Answers_sub"></a>
<div class="qa section sticky qa_show_unanswered_questions qa_no_answered" data-aid="9691344" data-few_contribs="1" data-search_enabled="0">
<h2>
<div class="altblock"></div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="qa_headline">Community Q&A</span>
</h2>
<div class="section_text" id="qa">
<div id="qa_answered_questions_container">
<div id="qa_aq_search_container">
<div class="qa_section_heading" id="qa_aq_search_heading">Search</div>
<input class="qa_aq_search" placeholder="Type your query here"/>
</div>
<a id="qa_add_curated_question">Add New Question</a>
<ul class="qa_questions qa_aqs" id="qa_article_questions"></ul>
</div>
<div class="qa_divider qa_no_unpatrolled_questions"></div>
<div class="qa_divider qa_no_visible_answers"></div>
<div class="qa_section_heading" id="qa_ask_heading">Ask a Question</div>
<div id="qa_submitted_question_form">
<input id="qa_asked_question" maxlength="200" placeholder="What do you need to know? We'll do our best to find the answer." type="text"/><div id="qa_asked_count">200 characters left</div>
<input id="qa_email" placeholder="Email address (optional)" type="text"/><div id="qa_email_prompt">Include your email address to get a message when this question is answered.</div>
<a class="button primary" id="qa_submit_button">Submit</a>
</div>
<!--  Template for rendering a submitted question -->
<script id="qa_submitted_question_item" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
				<li class="qa_sq" data-sqid="{{id}}">
	<div class="qa_divider"></div>
	<div class="qa_li_container">
		<div class="qa_bullet"></div>
		<div class="qa_sq_question">
			<div class="qa_q_txt">{{{text}}}</div>
			<div class="qa_editor_tools">
				<a class="qa_edit_submitted {{#qa_desktop}}button secondary{{/qa_desktop}}">{{qa_curate}}</a>
				{{^mobile_anon_user}}
				<a class="qa_flag_submitted" data-type="sq_flag">{{qa_flag}}</a>
				<a class="qa_ignore_submitted" data-type="sq_ignore">{{qa_ignore}}</a>
				{{/mobile_anon_user}}
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</li>

			</script><!--  Template for answer confirmation  --><script id="qa_answer_confirmation" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
				<div class="qa_answer_confirmation">

	<span class="x_button"></span>

	<div class="qa_answer_confirmation_response">
		<span class="qa_checkmark"></span>
		<div class="qa_social_login_heading standalone">{{qa_proposed_answer_confirmation}}</div>
	</div>

</div>


			</script><!--  Template form for creating/updating a curated question  --><script id="qa_question_edit_form" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
				<div class="qa_aq_edit_form">
	<div class="qa_aq_edit_form_status"></div>
	<textarea class="qa_cq_text" spellcheck="true" placeholder="{{qa_edit_form_question_placeholder}}">{{qa_edit_form_question}}</textarea>
	<div class="qa_invalid_msg qa_cq_text_error qap_char_limit">{{qa_cq_text_error}}</div>
	<textarea class="qa_ca_text" spellcheck="true" placeholder="{{qa_edit_form_answer_placeholder}}">{{qa_edit_form_answer}}</textarea>
	<div class="qa_invalid_msg qa_ca_text_error qap_char_limit">{{qa_ca_text_error}}</div>
	<div class="qa_invalid_msg qa_ca_text_error2 qap_char_limit">{{qa_ca_text_min}}</div>
	<div class="qa_invalid_msg qa_ca_text_error3 qap_char_limit">{{qa_ca_error_url}}</div>
	<div class="qa_invalid_msg qa_ca_text_error_phone qap_char_limit">{{qa_ca_error_phone}}</div>
	<input class="qa_pa_email" placeholder="{{qa_pa_email_placeholder}}"/>

	{{#qa_admin}}
		<span class="qa_edit_form_verifier_container">
			{{qa_edit_form_verifier_label}}
			<select class="qa_edit_form_verifier">
				{{#qa_edit_form_verifiers}}
					<option value="{{id}}" {{selected}}>{{name}}</option>
				{{/qa_edit_form_verifiers}}
			</select>
		</span>
		{{#qa_edit_form_show_remove_submitter}}
		<span class="qa_edit_form_remove_submitter_container">
			<label for="qa_aq_remove_submitter">{{qa_edit_form_remove_submitter}}</label> <input type="checkbox" id="qa_aq_remove_submitter" class="qa_checkbox" />

    "step": [
        {
            "@type": "HowToSection",
            "name": "Selecting a Courier Service",
            "position": 1,
            "itemListElement": [
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 1,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Prepare your package for courier pickup. Select an appropriate-sized box or envelope and place your item inside. Make sure if you\u2019re sending something fragile that your packaging is cushioned and your item is secure. Once you have your item or items in the appropriate package, seal the parcel with packaging tape.[1]\nDepending on where you are located, there are some restrictions on what you can and cannot mail. Items such as explosives, gasoline, aerosol, and ammunition are normally prohibited. Check the website of the national postal service in your country to ensure you are not mailing something that is prohibited."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 2,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Measure the parcel you\u2019d like to send. Carefully measure the length, width, and height of the box. If you have a kitchen scale, it will also be helpful to weigh the parcel as well. This will help you get a good idea of how much you can expect to pay for courier service. Many courier sites will ask you to input the parcel's dimensions and estimated weight when you book the pickup.[2]\nIf in doubt, overestimate. This will help you avoid additional charges later on."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 3,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Search for courier services that pick up near you. Some courier services only work within specific areas or countries. Many work internationally. To get the most accurate results, do a search of your city or town name and the words \u201ccourier service.\u201d This should yield a number of companies that provide service to your area.[3]\nYou should also check the delivery address to ensure that the courier service will deliver to that location. Most websites will have an address checker tool."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 4,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Compare prices for shipping your parcel at different companies. Narrow your search by looking at the prices listed for courier service based on the dimensions that you measured for your parcel. Compare different companies and see how their prices differ for the size package that you have.[4]\nYou should also consider the type of parcel being sent and if it has any requirements such as temperature or extra care when delivering, as these can incur added fees."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 5,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Check the pickup hours and delivery options offered by the courier. The service will likely require you to be present for pickup, so you will want to make sure you can be home during the hours specified. You might also look at any time guarantees that they might make, especially if you are working within a time frame.[5]\nSome courier services offer drop off locations. This might work best for you if you are not able to be at home during the day for pick up."
                    }
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "@type": "HowToSection",
            "name": "Booking Your Pickup",
            "position": 2,
            "itemListElement": [
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 1,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Create an account with your chosen service. This process will vary by website, but will normally require you to input some information. You will likely be asked to enter your name, address, phone number, email address, and some form of payment information. This will make the process of arranging a pickup much easier."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 2,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Select a location for pickup. If you would like the package picked up from your house, simply use your home address. However, if you are working from another location, make sure you carefully enter the address to avoid any confusion. Some couriers will allow you to select a time, but many places give you a window of time that your package will be picked up within.[6]\nDepending on the location you are sending the package to and the time frame it will take to get the package there, the price will vary. Make sure to check the price once more before booking a pickup time."
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 3,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Pay for and print your label. Once you have selected a location, you can confirm your pickup and pay. This will generate a label for your parcel that you can either print out and affix to the packaging, or simply copy the label information onto the package in clear handwriting using a marker.[7]"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 4,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Wait for collection by a courier. The courier should arrive during the time allotted by the company. Be patient and make sure you are home during this time. If your courier is late or doesn\u2019t show up, call the customer service number provided on the company website or in your confirmation email.[8]"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 5,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Track your parcel. Once your parcel is picked up, you should receive an email for tracking or be able to use your confirmation number provided. This will let you see where your package is located from pickup to delivery at any point.[9]\nIf at any point you see that your package is delayed, or if it gets delivered incorrectly, tracking the package can help you ensure that the problem is dealt with quickly."
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
